title: Expand possible PTT keys on the Mac
body:
For some reason, the Push-To-Talk shortcut keys on the Mac are extremely limited. I've always used tilde (~), but this is not accepted by Mumble. It only seems to accept Command, Option, Control or mouse buttons. 

Please allow us to map *any* key we'd like.


*This ticket has been migrated from sourceforge. It is thus missing some details like original creator etc.
The original is at https://sourceforge.net/p/mumble/feature-requests/1124/ .
